tasks.title: Create Life Event Object and Fields
tasks.description: Create the Life_Event__c object with fields: Event_Name__c, Event_Date__c, and Contact__c. Set the sharing model to Private.
acceptance_criteria: Life Event object is created with specified fields
Sharing model is set to Private

tasks.title: Setup Email Notification Flow
tasks.description: Create a Flow named 'Notify_Contact_On_Life_Event_Creation' to send an email to the associated Contact after a new Life Event record is created.
acceptance_criteria: Email is sent to the correct Contact upon Life Event creation

tasks.title: Configure Security Settings for Life Event Object
tasks.description: Set permissions for the Profile to allow View, Create, Edit, and Delete actions on Life Event records.
acceptance_criteria: Test that users with the Profile can perform CRUD on Life Event records

tasks.title: Create Life Event Page Layout
tasks.description: Design a Page Layout for Life Event to display Event Name, Event Date, and Contact fields, ensuring it is user-friendly.
acceptance_criteria: Page layout is created and linked to Life Event object
Fields are correctly displayed in the layout

tasks.title: Testing and Validation of Life Event Creation
tasks.description: Perform testing to ensure the Life Event object works correctly, including creation, flow automation, and security settings validation.
acceptance_criteria: Life Event records can be created, edited, and deleted by appropriate users
Email notifications are received by Contacts
Page layout functions correctly with all fields visible

key_risks: Misconfiguration of security settings - Mitigation: Review permissions with team during configuration.
Flow not triggered correctly - Mitigation: Testing each workflow after setup.
User access issues - Mitigation: Conduct thorough testing with user roles
success_criteria: Life Event records are created and visible to users with proper permissions
Email notifications are functioning as intended
Page layout is user-friendly and includes necessary fields
